last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 16
last_episode_to_air.overview: Three years later, Ju-hyeok and U-jin have come full circle — with revisions. Hye-won shows up at a university club reunion.

name: Familiar Wife
overview: After receiving a bizarre chance to go back in time, a man wakes up to find that his whole life — including the person he married — is different.
tagline: Why do I have to be the only one who lives such horrible life?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Cha Ju-hyeok and Seo U-jin lead an unhappy marriage as busy working parents. One day, Ju-hyeok is handed something special.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Ju-hyeok secretly buys a new video game console knowing that he's dead if U-jin finds out. Later, he returns to the mysterious toll booth.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ju-hyeok wakes up in a different house and lying next to a different wife. U-jin picks up a stranger's phone and tries to return it.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When U-jin begins her new job at the bank, Ju-hyeok tries to have her transfer to another branch. Lee Hye-won's behavior upsets Ju-hyeok's parents.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Meeting U-jin's mother startles Ju-hyeok, who finally learns about her condition. At the bank, U-jin is put in a potentially dangerous situation.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: After confessing his feelings to U-jin, Yoon Jong-hu volunteers to join her on an overnight work trip. Horrified, Ju-hyeok follows them.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A surprise visitor comes to the bank looking for Ju-hyeok. The three friends agree to go on a getaway together with their partners.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ju-hyeok wants to return to the way it was, but it may be too late. When her mother goes missing, U-jin is overcome with worry.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Finding out about Ju-hyeok's lie infuriates Hye-won. Meanwhile, a malevolent post is written about U-jin on an online community.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: After a fight with Ju-hyeok, Hye-won takes drastic action. U-jin and Jong-hu's co-workers find out about their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: U-jin has something to say to Jong-hu, who later overhears a conversation that stuns him. Hye-won sees the real Jung Hyeon-su.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: The truth about her unusual connection with Ju-hyeok becomes clear to U-jin. At work, a sudden emergency places Ju-hyeok at risk of losing his job.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Finding himself back in 2006, Ju-hyeok tries all he can to avoid U-jin. When they wake up in the present, life has changed again.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: To Ju-hyeok's distress, U-jin returns to the bank. While she wants to make things work, he remains adamant about pushing her away.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: While sneaking around their co-workers on a date, U-jin runs into her charming first love from her university days and makes Ju-hyeok jealous.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Three years later, Ju-hyeok and U-jin have come full circle — with revisions. Hye-won shows up at a university club reunion.
